sen.j: 徳政一揆（とくせいいっき）は、土一揆の一種。
sen.e: Tokusei uprising is a kind of peasants' uprising.
A Tokusei uprising is a type of peasant uprising.
sen.cmt: fixed grammar to read more naturally
sen.e: A Tokusei uprising is a type of peasant uprising.
Its purpose was the proclamation of Tokuseirei (ordering return of land sold and dissolution of debts).
The purpose of these uprisings was for a proclamation of Tokuseirei (ordering the return of sold land and a dissolution of debts).
sen.cmt: changed "It" to "The purpose of these uprisings" for a more definite subject
sen.e: The purpose of these uprisings was for a proclamation of Tokuseirei (ordering the return of sold land and a dissolution of debts).

sen.j: 室町時代、1429年の正長の土一揆をはじめに多発し、このとき勢いが衰えるまでに時間がかかった。
sen.e: It frequently occurred in the Muromachi Period beginning with Shocho no doikki (a peasants' uprising of Shocho era) in 1429.
Tokusei uprisings frequently occurred during the Muromachi period beginning with the Shocho no doikki (peasant uprising of the Shocho era) in 1429 which took a long time to subside.
sen.cmt: the following sentence did not feel natural as an independent sentence, so I combined it with this one
sen.e: Tokusei uprisings frequently occurred during the Muromachi period beginning with the Shocho no doikki (peasant uprising of the Shocho era) in 1429 which took a long time to subside.

sen.j: 「徳政一揆」とつくものでは嘉吉の徳政一揆が有名。
sen.e: Among "Tokusei ikki", the one which occurred in the Kakitsu era is well-known.
A famous uprising among "Tokusei ikki" was the one that occurred during the Kakitsu era.
A famous uprising among "Tokusei ikki" was the one that occurred during the Kakitsu era.

sen.j: 原因として、凶作、伝染病、過疎、将軍の不信任など様々。
sen.e: Various causes lied behind Tokusi ikki including, but not limited to, an poor harvest, infectious disease, depopulation and non-confidence in shogun etc.
Among the various causes behind a Tokusei ikki include poor harvests, infectious diseases, a declining population and a lack of trust in the shogun.
sen.cmt: fixed grammar to read more naturally
sen.e: Among the various causes behind a Tokusei ikki include poor harvests, infectious diseases, a declining population and a lack of trust in the shogun.

sen.j: また一揆に参加する人は馬借や問屋や問丸など。
sen.e: Its participants were bashaku (shipping agents who used horses), toiya (warehouse merchants) and toimaru (specialized wholesale merchants) etc.
Participants in an uprising included bashaku (shipping agents who used horses), toiyo (warehouse merchants) and toimaru (specialized wholesale merchants).
